hi and welcome you listening to the x12
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1361 a and today's date is
August 22nd 2017 and the top of the
episode is it begins Johnny pulls West's
investment dollars and redirects it east
let's get into the economic collapse
financial news now as we know the
economy well from all indicators that
we've been looking at the economy is
slipping and deteriorating very very
quickly but of course the government the
Fed they're out there telling us that
the economy is doing very well right now
what they're telling us is that
unemployment is at four point four
percent and this is at a 16 year low
suggesting there's little of any slack
in the US economy now this is according
to the feds Beige Book and what they're
saying is that we're seeing shortages
where they can't find people to work now
the National Association of Homebuilders
they're out there also saying listen we
can't find qualified construction
workers to work and they're saying that
it's becoming very very difficult now
they're all out there telling us how
great everything is and then we have the
new Federal Reserve survey which kind of
says something a little different what
they're saying is for the first time US
workers and jobseekers are so
disenchanted with the labor situation
and harbor so little hope for higher
paychecks that even as they increasingly
search for new jobs they are not only
expecting fewer jobs and fewer offers
but anticipate a lower paycheck now
let's think about this for a second
because if they can't find workers that
means they're going to pay a lot more
money to get those people in because
there's few people to work now I saw
this back in the 90s during the whole
entire
windows administration and things like
that where they couldn't find qualified
people because it was new and what they
did was they paid people who knew sequel
people who knew how to administer
Windows on a network they paid them
quite a bit of money because they were
few n there weren't that many workers
out there so what they're telling us
right now is that you know they can't
find these qualified people but people
are saying that they expect lo-ove fewer
job offers and lower pay
now something doesn't make sense here
now according to the Fed survey we
respond and said in July that the lowest
annual salary they would accept in a new
job would be around fifty seven thousand
nine hundred and sixty down from fifty
nine thousand six hundred and sixty only
four months earlier so what we're
looking at right now is something that
really doesn't make any sense
now we need to remember that a lot of
these numbers were manipulated a lot of
these numbers are fake phony and false
and a lot of these jobs which brought
down the unemployment numbers they are
part-time waiter bartender and jobs like
that and we can see right now the
full-time high-paying jobs they're
really non-existent because remember how
they work all this they count a
part-time job as a full-time job so if
you have two part-time jobs you have two
full-time jobs and this is how they were
able to bring the unemployment number
down now they used other manipulated
tactics to massage the numbers to make
it look like everything is fine now what
we're seeing is that the quality of
available jobs they're just not out
there and respondents saw a 22 percent
likelihood of receiving at least one job
offer in the next four months down from
an average response of 25 percent in
eight months ago so already they're
expecting to see less job offers now
what's very interesting at
one point they're saying that they can't
find qualified workers on another point
they're saying that we're at the lowest
unemployment rate and salaries are
falling and people expect they're not
going to get any offers something
doesn't make sense and of course we know
what that is the whole thing is a
complete lie now
the New York Times is reporting that
there is a problem in Silicon Valley
they're saying that we're in a
full-fledged housing crisis and local
officials out there are worrying they
saying that the affordability well it's
not there it's very expensive people are
leaving and we're already getting
indicators from the corporate media that
there are problems now we we saw this
before during the 2008 crisis when it
began remember those televised shots
where people were leaving their homes
they couldn't afford them anymore
interest rates we're moving up I had
adjustable rate mortgages and they left
you know their furniture their
belongings and they just left the home
because they just couldn't afford it
anymore well it looks like we might be
going down this same exact path because
what is happening right now is people
are saying that is it is just too
expensive to live in this area they
can't afford the homes they can't bring
people into the homes and right now
California is in crisis mode and if
these interest rates move up just a
little bit it will be a complete and
utter disaster
now the chicago national activity index
well its surprised economists with a
negative reading now what is the Chicago
Fed national activity index it is a
monthly index designed to gauge the
overall economic activity and related
inflationary pressure now economists
predicted a strong July reading for the
Chicago Fed national activity index but
what they found was a negative reading
reading of negative point zero one and
they expected a positive point two two
so we can see already
they were sideswipe they had no idea
that this was going to happen but we
kind of did because we've been looking
at all these different indicators and we
realized that the economy has been built
up on a gigantic illusion and what's
happening is one sector at a time well
it's starting to fall apart and a lot of
these economies are going to come out
there and say we you know this was
completely unexpected that's the word
they like to use oh it was an unexpected
decline now we see Treasury secretary
Steve minuchin he went out and he
decided to visit Fort Knox now this is
very strange because the last
congressional visit was in 1974 and of
course there's been speculation over the
existence of gold in Fort Knox many
people say it is not there and he
decided to go visit it now what's very
interesting about all of this he told us
that the gold is safe everything is okay
now there was no camera crew there was
no proof it was his him just going in
there reassuring the American people
that everything is fine now to me this
is suspect because why can't they show
the American people the gold why wasn't
there any type of proof that can be
shown to the American people having
someone just go down there or who knows

isn't right and he made a joke about

Kentucky some 40 miles north of the

really be quite a movie if we walked in
and there was no gold which most of us
because it hasn't really been an audit
of the gold in Fort Knox that do we
really know it is actually there and I
think the American people have the right
to see it I think the American people
have the
right to know if the gold is still there
and I think it's very interesting that
there was no camera crew because usually
these type of people like to show off
they like to have camera crews they like
to show you what they're doing when it
fits their agenda well this this is
suspect once again we see that Norway's

fund they're getting ready to buy a
hundred billion dollars more in stocks
and they're saying this is the safeguard
the country's richest so they're
investing in stocks to safeguard the
country's risks and we know there are

to make everyone believe that things are
okay we know that the Swiss National
Bank they hold a lot of Apple stock so
was the purchase of all these stocks
really to help their investment and to
safeguard the country where was it to
pump the global market up and I'm going
to say it was to pump the global market

system and we know that China well they
have this new law where Chinese
investment companies corporations they
need to redirect their funds and take
their investments and invest it in the

the hospitality industry well they're

let's say right now we're at the height

in China says you know something let's

the free money
was based on certain entities it wasn't

because Beijing is telling companies to

redirect your funds to the belt and Road
and we can see it has begun which means

here in the United States going to be a

the central banks what can they do about
this can they create more currency of
course can they get more to the
investment hedge fund companies of
course but can they keep up with this no
it's going to be very difficult which
means
they need to do one or two things they

to say we need to create a lot more

now the economy is deteriorating very
very quickly we see we have a housing

to spread we know they've been pumping

the outlying areas guess what prices are

more homes on the market and they just

lowering the prices the people saying
what's going on here I had to lowered
another ten thousand dollars
I had to lower another twenty thousand
dollars I can't move my house and we're

well it's starting to fall apart and it

because we've been lied to for so long
they really believe the economy is doing
well they believe that who cares of all

shopping online that's what I hear I
mean from people out there who really

online that's why all the
brick-and-mortar stores are closing and
